REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f0529 reute r f BC-<CINEPLEX-ODEON-CORP> 03-06 0074

TEXT.TITLE: <CINEPLEX ODEON CORP> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr basic 1.04 dlrs vs 77 cts Oper shr diluted 89 cts vs 60 cts Oper net 31.6 mln vs 12.5 mln Revs 500.6 mln vs 170.9 mln Avg shrs 29.1 mln vs 14.3 mln Note: 1985 net excludes extraordinary gain of 1,756,000 dlrs or 12 cts shr basic and eight cts shr diluted. 1986 net involves 53-week reporting period to reflect change in yr-end to coincide with calendar yr. Reuter
